_sText:
After the destruction of the Combine empire on earth

the human race was finally recovering from the traumas of the combine.

City 04 went a rough battle but its citadel still stands, the combine

are gone so alot needs to be salvage and fix but in a certain place

An old trading hub that was destroyed after 

the 14 hour war now an abandoned place used for storing 

high explosives and Combine technology weapons and now

a target of some few anarchistic bandits that

wanted to destroy the crates as they believed that in a

post apocalyptic world, there is no law or form of government.
